Package shape

Class Shape3D

java.lang.Object
shape.Shape3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Shape3D>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cone, Cylinder, OctagonalPrism, PentagonalPrism, Pyramid, SquarePrism, TriangularPrism
public abstract class Shape3D extends Object implements Comparable<Shape3D>
Represents a 3D shape. Provides abstract methods for retrieving properties of the shape such as height, base area, and volume. Also defines the ability to compare shapes based on certain criteria.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Shape3D other)
      Compares this shape to another based on their heights.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Shape3D>
      Parameters:
      other - the other shape to compare to.
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this shape's height is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified shape's height respectively.
